document_data.mainbody:
Edventar was a reef hunter-scavenger from South Faer√ªn, the namesake of Edventars Gift, who lived in the mid-14 century DR.
Edventar gained his notability in history for his help in routing Yenandra Hazmcri, the Pirate Queen Dambrath in the . This act saved the lives of the local sea elves, Edventars life-long friends. Edventars Gift was an enchanted ring that was presented to Edventar after the Queens fall as a gesture of gratitude by the aquatic elves.
